description: A paranormal researcher and the handsome 17 year-old president of the SPR, Shibuya Psychic Research. His nickname "Naru" is short for "narcissist", given to him by Mai. Contrary to the other characters, he does not appear to possess any kind of spiritual power, and must count on his companions` abilities and his own intellect and knowledge to solve the cases they investigate.
name: Shibuya Kazuya
